name: Think Spark
tagline: The smallest BIG ad agency on earth.
description:
Spark Inc is a full-service advertising agency offering the highest caliber of work typically found only at large, exorbitantly priced firms. We offer affordable award-winning creative work, innovative marketing consultation, fearless strategic planning and free coffee. At Spark, Inc., the difference is our process. We start each project by throwing out the expected. We work collaboratively with clients. We research.
We focus on creating a true emotional bond between the target audience and you. Yes, our staff includes some of the brightest talent in marketing, but itâ€™s working within this process that makes us successful time and again.
